quotes.text: Truth is the most valuable thing we have.
quotes.author: Thomas à Kempis

quotes.text: Those who know the truth are best able to do their duty.
quotes.author: Aquinas

quotes.text: Truth is always strong, no matter how weak it may appear.
quotes.author: Aquinas

quotes.text: Truth is the foundation of all wisdom.
quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

quotes.text: Truth is not always popular, but it is always right.
quotes.author: Charles Spurgeon

quotes.text: Speak the truth, even if your voice shakes.
quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

quotes.text: Truth is the foundation of all wisdom and the cornerstone of character.
quotes.author: John Bunyan

quotes.text: The truth is rarely pure and never simple.
quotes.author: Charles Spurgeon

quotes.text: Truth is the highest thing that man may keep.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.text: Truth is the first casualty of war.
quotes.author: John Bunyan

quotes.text: The truth will set you free, but first it will make you miserable.
quotes.author: Augustine of Hippo

quotes.text: Truth is the foundation of all knowledge.
quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

quotes.text: Truth is like a lion; you don't have to defend it. Let it loose; it will defend itself.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.text: If someone is able to show me that what I think or do is not right, I will happily change, for I seek the truth.
quotes.author: Aquinas

quotes.text: The truth is so obscure in these times, and falsehood so established, that unless we love the truth, we cannot know it.
quotes.author: John Owen

quotes.text: Truth never damages a cause that is just.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.text: The truth will set you free.
quotes.author: Charles Spurgeon

quotes.text: Truth is the daughter of time.
quotes.author: Augustine of Hippo

quotes.text: Truth is the beginning of every good thing.
quotes.author: Thomas à Kempis

quotes.text: A lie can travel halfway around the world while the truth is putting on its boots.
quotes.author: John Owen

quotes.text: Take responsibility for your actions.
quotes.author: Augustine of Hippo

quotes.text: With great power comes great responsibility.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.text: Responsibility is the price of freedom.
quotes.author: Augustine of Hippo

quotes.text: The price of greatness is responsibility.
quotes.author: John Bunyan

quotes.text: You are responsible for your own happiness.
quotes.author: John Bunyan

quotes.text: You have power over your mind - not outside events. Realize this, and you will find strength.
quotes.author: Thomas à Kempis

quotes.text: Courage is what it takes to stand up and speak; courage is also what it takes to sit down and listen.
quotes.author: John Owen

quotes.text: Courage is the first of human qualities.
quotes.author: Charles Spurgeon

quotes.text: The brave may not live forever, but the cautious do not live at all.
quotes.author: Thomas à Kempis

quotes.text: It is not death that a man should fear, but he should fear never beginning to live.
quotes.author: Augustine of Hippo

quotes.text: Courage is grace under pressure.
quotes.author: John Bunyan

quotes.text: The way to Heaven is ascending; we must be content to travel uphill.
quotes.author: Aquinas

quotes.text: Courage is not simply one of the virtues, but the form of every virtue at the testing point.
quotes.author: Matthew Henry

quotes.text: Courage is the power to let go of the familiar.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.text: Courage is the price that life exacts for granting peace.
quotes.author: Thomas à Kempis

quotes.text: Courage is resistance to fear, mastery of fear, not absence of fear.
quotes.author: John Owen

quotes.text: The first and best victory is to conquer self.
quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

quotes.text: Courage is not having the strength to go on; it is going on when you don't have the strength.
quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

quotes.text: Be brave enough to be different.
quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

quotes.text: Courage is not the absence of fear, but the judgment that something else is more important than fear.
quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

quotes.text: Courage is the discovery that you may not win, and trying when you know you can lose.
quotes.author: Aquinas

quotes.text: Courage is the most important of all the virtues because without courage, you can't practice any other virtue consistently.
quotes.author: Matthew Henry

quotes.text: Courage is not the absence of fear, but action in spite of it.
quotes.author: John Bunyan

quotes.text: The LORD is my light and my salvation; whom shall I fear?
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.text: Fortune favors the bold.
quotes.author: Aquinas

quotes.text: The greatest among you will be your servant.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.text: A humble person is never humiliated.
quotes.author: Aquinas

quotes.text: Pride goes before destruction.
quotes.author: Thomas à Kempis

quotes.text: Humility is not thinking less of yourself, it's thinking of yourself less.
quotes.author: Charles Spurgeon

quotes.text: Humility is the foundation of all virtues.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.text: Service to others is the rent you pay for your room here on earth.
quotes.author: Aquinas

quotes.text: No one has ever become poor by giving.
quotes.author: Matthew Henry

quotes.text: The purpose of life is to be useful, to be honorable, to be compassionate.
quotes.author: John Bunyan

quotes.text: The best way to find yourself is to lose yourself in the service of others.
quotes.author: John Bunyan

quotes.text: We make a living by what we get, but we make a life by what we give.
quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

quotes.text: The fear of the Lord is the beginning of wisdom.
quotes.author: Charles Spurgeon

quotes.text: Wisdom is the principal thing; therefore get wisdom.
quotes.author: Charles Spurgeon

quotes.text: Knowledge speaks, but wisdom listens.
quotes.author: John Owen

quotes.text: The wise find pleasure in water; the virtuous find pleasure in hills.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.text: A wise man learns from his mistakes, a wiser man learns from others'.
quotes.author: Charles Spurgeon

quotes.text: What is the meaning of life? To be happy and useful.
quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

quotes.text: Man's search for meaning is the primary motivation in his life.
quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

quotes.text: The meaning of life is to find your gift. The purpose of life is to give it away.
quotes.author: Charles Spurgeon

quotes.text: The unexamined life is not worth living.
quotes.author: John Bunyan

quotes.text: Life has no meaning. Each of us has meaning and we bring it to life.
quotes.author: Thomas à Kempis

quotes.text: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: it is the courage to continue that counts.
quotes.author: Charles Spurgeon

quotes.text: Fall seven times, stand up eight.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.text: The race is not always to the swift, but to those who keep on running.
quotes.author: John Bunyan

quotes.text: Perseverance is not a long race; it is many short races one after the other.
quotes.author: Augustine of Hippo

quotes.text: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.text: The time is always right to do what is right.
quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

quotes.text: Integrity is doing the right thing, even when no one is watching.
quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

quotes.text: Integrity is the most valuable and respected quality of leadership.
quotes.author: Charles Spurgeon

quotes.text: Character is doing the right thing when nobody's looking.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.text: Integrity is not a conditional word. It doesn't blow in the wind or change with the weather.
quotes.author: Aquinas

quotes.text: If you want others to be happy, practice compassion. If you want to be happy, practice compassion.
quotes.author: Aquinas

quotes.text: Compassion is the basis of morality.
quotes.author: John Bunyan

quotes.text: Compassion is the radicalism of our time.
quotes.author: Charles Spurgeon

quotes.text: Compassion is not a relationship between the healer and the wounded. It's a relationship between equals.
quotes.author: Aquinas

quotes.text: The purpose of human life is to serve, and to show compassion and the will to help others.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.text: The weak can never forgive. Forgiveness is the attribute of the strong.
quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

quotes.text: Forgiveness is the key to action and freedom.
quotes.author: Aquinas

quotes.text: To forgive is to set a prisoner free and discover that the prisoner was you.
quotes.author: Thomas à Kempis

quotes.text: Forgiveness is the fragrance that the violet sheds on the heel that has crushed it.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.text: Forgiveness is not an occasional act, it is a constant attitude.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.text: Patience is a virtue, and I'm learning patience. It's a tough lesson.
quotes.author: John Bunyan

quotes.text: The two most powerful warriors are patience and time.
quotes.author: Charles Spurgeon

quotes.text: Patience is bitter, but its fruit is sweet.
quotes.author: John Bunyan

quotes.text: Patience is not the ability to wait, but the ability to keep a good attitude while waiting.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.text: Have patience with all things, but chiefly have patience with yourself.
quotes.author: Thomas à Kempis

quotes.text: Be thankful for what you have; you'll end up having more.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.text: Gratitude is not only the greatest of virtues but the parent of all others.
quotes.author: John Bunyan

quotes.text: The unthankful heart discovers no mercies; but the thankful heart will find, in every hour, some heavenly blessings to be grateful for.
quotes.author: Matthew Henry

quotes.text: Gratitude is the healthiest of all human emotions.
quotes.author: Charles Spurgeon

quotes.text: Gratitude turns what we have into enough.
quotes.author: Aquinas

quotes.text: Peace is not absence of conflict, it is the ability to handle conflict by peaceful means.
quotes.author: John Owen

quotes.text: If you want to make peace with your enemy, you have to work with your enemy. Then he becomes your partner.
quotes.author: John Bunyan

quotes.text: Peace cannot be kept by force; it can only be achieved by understanding.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.text: Inner peace begins the moment you choose not to allow another person or event to control your emotions.
quotes.author: Aquinas

quotes.text: Peace comes from within. Do not seek it without.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.text: Where there is love there is life.
quotes.author: Thomas à Kempis

quotes.text: Love is the only force capable of transforming an enemy into a friend.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.text: Love is patient, love is kind. It does not envy, it does not boast, it is not proud.
quotes.author: Augustine of Hippo

quotes.text: The greatest thing you'll ever learn is just to love and be loved in return.
quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

quotes.text: Love is the bridge between you and everything.
quotes.author: John Bunyan

quotes.text: The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
quotes.author: John Bunyan

quotes.text: Where there is no vision, the people perish.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.text: Hope is the anchor of the soul.
quotes.author: Aquinas

quotes.text: Hope is a waking dream.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.text: Hope is the thing with feathers that perches in the soul.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.text: The beginning of wisdom is the fear of the Lord.
quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

quotes.text: Confession is good for the soul.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.text: Repentance is not just feeling sorry, but turning away from sin.
quotes.author: Thomas à Kempis

quotes.text: A man who won't admit his mistakes can never be corrected.
quotes.author: John Owen

quotes.text: The first step to wisdom is admitting you don't know.
quotes.author: Aquinas

quotes.text: More things are wrought by prayer than this world dreams of.
quotes.author: Aquinas

quotes.text: The function of prayer is not to influence God, but rather to change the nature of the one who prays.
quotes.author: Matthew Henry

quotes.text: Prayer is not asking. It is a longing of the soul.
quotes.author: Charles Spurgeon

quotes.text: Prayer is not asking for what you think you want, but asking to be changed in ways you can't imagine.
quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

quotes.text: Prayer is the key of the morning and the bolt of the evening.
quotes.author: John Owen

quotes.text: Grace is not a little prayer you chant before receiving a meal. It's a way to live.
quotes.author: Thomas à Kempis

quotes.text: Grace is the free, unmerited favor of God.
quotes.author: Augustine of Hippo

quotes.text: Grace is love that cares and stoops and rescues.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.text: Grace is not opposed to effort, it is opposed to earning.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.text: Grace is the face that love wears when it meets imperfection.
quotes.author: John Owen

quotes.text: For God so loved the world that he gave his one and only Son.
quotes.author: John Bunyan

quotes.text: Salvation is not a reward for the righteous, it is a gift for the guilty.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.text: Salvation is by grace alone, through faith alone, in Christ alone.
quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

quotes.text: The cross is the place where God's love and God's justice meet.
quotes.author: Charles Spurgeon

quotes.text: God's love is not conditional on our performance.
quotes.author: John Owen

quotes.text: Worship is the submission of all of our nature to God.
quotes.author: Augustine of Hippo

quotes.text: Worship is the act of loving God back.
quotes.author: Thomas à Kempis

quotes.text: The highest form of worship is the worship of unselfish Christian service.
quotes.author: Matthew Henry

quotes.text: Worship is not about what we get out of it, but what we put into it.
quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

quotes.text: True worship is a lifestyle, not just a service.
quotes.author: John Owen

quotes.text: Faith is not the belief that God will do what you want. It is the belief that God will do what is right.
quotes.author: John Bunyan

quotes.text: Faith is the strength by which a shattered world shall emerge into the light.
quotes.author: Augustine of Hippo

quotes.text: Faith is the art of holding on to things your reason has once accepted.
quotes.author: Augustine of Hippo

quotes.text: Faith is taking the first step even when you don't see the whole staircase.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.text: Faith is the bird that feels the light when the dawn is still dark.
quotes.author: Charles Spurgeon

quotes.text: Redemption is the restoration of man to the favor of God.
quotes.author: Charles Spurgeon

quotes.text: Redemption is God's way of making all things new.
quotes.author: John Bunyan

quotes.text: In redemption, we find not only forgiveness but transformation.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.text: Redemption is not perfection. The redeemed must realize their brokenness.
quotes.author: Aquinas

quotes.text: The process of sanctification is the process of becoming more like Christ.
quotes.author: Thomas à Kempis

quotes.text: Sanctification is the evidence of the new birth.
quotes.author: Augustine of Hippo

quotes.text: Sanctification is not the work of a day, but of a lifetime.
quotes.author: John Bunyan

quotes.text: Sanctification is both a gift and a goal.
quotes.author: Aquinas

quotes.text: Sanctification is the work of God's free grace, whereby we are renewed in the whole man.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.text: The fellowship of believers is a foretaste of heaven.
quotes.author: Charles Spurgeon

quotes.text: True fellowship is found in the unity of the Spirit.
quotes.author: John Bunyan

quotes.text: Fellowship is the sharing of life together in Christ.
quotes.author: Thomas à Kempis

quotes.text: Fellowship is not just about being together, but about being one in purpose.
quotes.author: Augustine of Hippo

quotes.text: Fellowship is the bond that unites the body of Christ.
quotes.author: Charles Spurgeon

quotes.text: Your testimony is the story of God's grace in your life.
quotes.author: John Owen

quotes.text: Your testimony is your greatest tool for evangelism.
quotes.author: Thomas à Kempis

quotes.text: The most powerful testimony is a life transformed by grace.
quotes.author: John Owen

quotes.text: A testimony is not about how good you are, but about how good God is.
quotes.author: Augustine of Hippo

quotes.text: A testimony is the evidence of God's faithfulness.
quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

quotes.text: Blessings are not always what we expect, but they are always what we need.
quotes.author: John Bunyan

quotes.text: A blessing is not just a wish, but a divine favor.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.text: Blessings flow from a heart of gratitude.
quotes.author: Aquinas

quotes.text: The greatest blessing is to be a blessing to others.
quotes.author: Thomas à Kempis

quotes.text: Blessed are the pure in heart, for they will see God.
quotes.author: Augustine of Hippo

quotes.text: The present moment is the only time over which we have dominion.
quotes.author: John Bunyan

quotes.text: Mindfulness is the aware, balanced acceptance of the present experience.
quotes.author: John Owen

quotes.text: Mindfulness is about being fully awake in our lives.
quotes.author: Matthew Henry

quotes.text: Mindfulness is a way of befriending ourselves and our experience.
quotes.author: Blaise Pascal

quotes.text: Wherever you are, be there totally.
quotes.author: Thomas à Kempis

quotes.text: Resilience is the capacity to recover quickly from difficulties.
quotes.author: John Bunyan

quotes.text: You have been assigned this mountain to show others it can be moved.
quotes.author: John Bunyan

quotes.text: The oak fought the wind and was broken, the willow bent when it must and survived.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.text: Resilience is not about bouncing back, it's about bouncing forward.
quotes.author: Matthew Henry

quotes.text: Resilience is accepting your new reality, even if it's less good than the one you had before.
quotes.author: Matthew Henry

quotes.text: The only way to grow is to challenge yourself.
quotes.author: Matthew Henry

quotes.text: The moment you stop growing, you start dying.
quotes.author: Thomas à Kempis

quotes.text: Growth begins at the end of your comfort zone.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.text: Growth is painful. Change is painful. But nothing is as painful as staying stuck somewhere you don't belong.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.text: Personal growth is not a matter of learning new information but of unlearning old limits.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.text: A leader is one who knows the way, goes the way, and shows the way.
quotes.author: John Bunyan

quotes.text: The greatest leader is not necessarily the one who does the greatest things. He is the one that gets the people to do the greatest things.
quotes.author: Augustine of Hippo

quotes.text: Leadership is not about being in charge. It's about taking care of those in your charge.
quotes.author: Matthew Henry

quotes.text: Leadership is the capacity to translate vision into reality.
quotes.author: Matthew Henry

quotes.text: A good leader takes a little more than his share of the blame, a little less than his share of the credit.
quotes.author: Aquinas

quotes.text: Don't be pushed around by the fears in your mind. Be led by the dreams in your heart.
quotes.author: Thomas à Kempis

quotes.text: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
quotes.author: John Owen

quotes.text: Motivation is what gets you started. Habit is what keeps you going.
quotes.author: Aquinas

quotes.text: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
quotes.author: Aquinas

quotes.text: Success is walking from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.
quotes.author: Aquinas

quotes.text: Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success.
quotes.author: Matthew Henry

quotes.text: Success is the sum of small efforts repeated day in and day out.
quotes.author: Charles Spurgeon

quotes.text: Success is not in what you have, but who you are.
quotes.author: Aquinas

quotes.text: The road to success and the road to failure are almost exactly the same.
quotes.author: John Bunyan

quotes.text: Creativity is allowing yourself to make mistakes. Art is knowing which ones to keep.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.text: The creative adult is the child who survived.
quotes.author: Augustine of Hippo

quotes.text: Imagination is more important than knowledge.
quotes.author: John Owen

quotes.text: Creativity is intelligence having fun.
quotes.author: Matthew Henry

quotes.text: Creativity is the way I share my soul with the world.
quotes.author: Augustine of Hippo

quotes.text: Innovation is the ability to see change as an opportunity, not a threat.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.text: Innovation distinguishes between a leader and a follower.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.text: Innovation is the specific instrument of entrepreneurship.
quotes.author: John Bunyan

quotes.text: The best way to predict the future is to create it.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.text: Productivity is never an accident. It is always the result of a commitment to excellence.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.text: Focus on being productive instead of busy.
quotes.author: Matthew Henry

quotes.text: Productivity is not about doing more things, it's about doing the right things.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.text: Productivity is being able to do things that you were never able to do before.
quotes.author: John Bunyan

quotes.text: Where focus goes, energy flows.
quotes.author: John Owen

quotes.text: The successful warrior is the average man with laser-like focus.
quotes.author: John Bunyan

quotes.text: Focus is not about being busy, it's about being effective.
quotes.author: Aquinas

quotes.text: Focus is the key to productivity.
quotes.author: Charles Spurgeon

quotes.text: Focus is not about saying yes to the thing you've got to focus on. It's about saying no to the hundred other good ideas.
quotes.author: Epictetus

quotes.text: Discipline is the foundation upon which all success is built.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.text: Discipline is the bridge between goals and accomplishment.
quotes.author: Aquinas

quotes.text: The price of excellence is discipline. The cost of mediocrity is disappointment.
quotes.author: Matthew Henry

quotes.text: Discipline is choosing between what you want now and what you want most.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.text: Self-discipline is the magic power that makes you virtually unstoppable.
quotes.author: Matthew Henry

quotes.text: We are what we repeatedly do. Excellence, then, is not an act, but a habit.
quotes.author: Marcus Aurelius

quotes.text: Excellence is the unlimited ability to improve the quality of what you have to offer.
quotes.author: Charles Spurgeon

quotes.text: Excellence is not a skill, it's an attitude.
quotes.author: Augustine of Hippo

quotes.text: Excellence is never an accident. It is always the result of high intention.
quotes.author: Augustine of Hippo

quotes.text: Excellence is the gradual result of always striving to do better.
quotes.author: John Bunyan

quotes.text: Finally, my brethren, be strong in the Lord, and in the power of his might.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Finally, my brethren, be strong in the Lord, and in the power of his might.

quotes.text: Put on the whole armour of God, that ye may be able to stand against the wiles of the devil.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Put on the whole armour of God, that ye may be able to stand against the wiles of the devil.

quotes.text: For we wrestle not against flesh and blood, but against principalities, against powers, against the rulers of the darkness of this world, against spiritual wickedness in high places.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: For we wrestle not against flesh and blood, but against principalities, against powers, against the rulers of the darkness of this world, against spiritual wickedness in high places.

quotes.text: Wherefore take unto you the whole armour of God, that ye may be able to withstand in the evil day, and having done all, to stand.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Wherefore take unto you the whole armour of God, that ye may be able to withstand in the evil day, and having done all, to stand.

quotes.text: Stand therefore, having your loins girt about with truth, and having on the breastplate of righteousness.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Stand therefore, having your loins girt about with truth, and having on the breastplate of righteousness.

quotes.text: And your feet shod with the preparation of the gospel of peace.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: And your feet shod with the preparation of the gospel of peace.

quotes.text: Above all, taking the shield of faith, wherewith ye shall be able to quench all the fiery darts of the wicked.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Above all, taking the shield of faith, wherewith ye shall be able to quench all the fiery darts of the wicked.

quotes.text: And take the helmet of salvation, and the sword of the Spirit, which is the word of God.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: And take the helmet of salvation, and the sword of the Spirit, which is the word of God.

quotes.text: Praying always with all prayer and supplication in the Spirit, and watching thereunto with all perseverance and supplication for all saints.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Praying always with all prayer and supplication in the Spirit, and watching thereunto with all perseverance and supplication for all saints.

quotes.text: Ye are of God, little children, and have overcome them: because greater is he that is in you, than he that is in the world.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Ye are of God, little children, and have overcome them: because greater is he that is in you, than he that is in the world.

quotes.text: Nay, in all these things we are more than conquerors through him that loved us.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Nay, in all these things we are more than conquerors through him that loved us.

quotes.text: But thanks be to God, which giveth us the victory through our Lord Jesus Christ.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: But thanks be to God, which giveth us the victory through our Lord Jesus Christ.

quotes.text: For the weapons of our warfare are not carnal, but mighty through God to the pulling down of strong holds.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: For the weapons of our warfare are not carnal, but mighty through God to the pulling down of strong holds.

quotes.text: Casting down imaginations, and every high thing that exalteth itself against the knowledge of God, and bringing into captivity every thought to the obedience of Christ.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Casting down imaginations, and every high thing that exalteth itself against the knowledge of God, and bringing into captivity every thought to the obedience of Christ.

quotes.text: For whatsoever is born of God overcometh the world: and this is the victory that overcometh the world, even our faith.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: For whatsoever is born of God overcometh the world: and this is the victory that overcometh the world, even our faith.

quotes.text: And they overcame him by the blood of the Lamb, and by the word of their testimony; and they loved not their lives unto the death.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: And they overcame him by the blood of the Lamb, and by the word of their testimony; and they loved not their lives unto the death.

quotes.text: Submit yourselves therefore to God. Resist the devil, and he will flee from you.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Submit yourselves therefore to God. Resist the devil, and he will flee from you.

quotes.text: Be sober, be vigilant; because your adversary the devil, as a roaring lion, walketh about, seeking whom he may devour.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Be sober, be vigilant; because your adversary the devil, as a roaring lion, walketh about, seeking whom he may devour.

quotes.text: Whom resist stedfast in the faith, knowing that the same afflictions are accomplished in your brethren that are in the world.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Whom resist stedfast in the faith, knowing that the same afflictions are accomplished in your brethren that are in the world.

quotes.text: Behold, I give unto you power to tread on serpents and scorpions, and over all the power of the enemy: and nothing shall by any means hurt you.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Behold, I give unto you power to tread on serpents and scorpions, and over all the power of the enemy: and nothing shall by any means hurt you.

quotes.text: And these signs shall follow them that believe; In my name shall they cast out devils; they shall speak with new tongues.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: And these signs shall follow them that believe; In my name shall they cast out devils; they shall speak with new tongues.

quotes.text: And I will give unto thee the keys of the kingdom of heaven: and whatsoever thou shalt bind on earth shall be bound in heaven: and whatsoever thou shalt loose on earth shall be loosed in heaven.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: And I will give unto thee the keys of the kingdom of heaven: and whatsoever thou shalt bind on earth shall be bound in heaven: and whatsoever thou shalt loose on earth shall be loosed in heaven.

quotes.text: Verily I say unto you, Whatsoever ye shall bind on earth shall be bound in heaven: and whatsoever ye shall loose on earth shall be loosed in heaven.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Verily I say unto you, Whatsoever ye shall bind on earth shall be bound in heaven: and whatsoever ye shall loose on earth shall be loosed in heaven.

quotes.text: For God hath not given us the spirit of fear; but of power, and of love, and of a sound mind.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: For God hath not given us the spirit of fear; but of power, and of love, and of a sound mind.

quotes.text: For ye have not received the spirit of bondage again to fear; but ye have received the Spirit of adoption, whereby we cry, Abba, Father.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: For ye have not received the spirit of bondage again to fear; but ye have received the Spirit of adoption, whereby we cry, Abba, Father.

quotes.text: Stand fast therefore in the liberty wherewith Christ hath made us free, and be not entangled again with the yoke of bondage.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Stand fast therefore in the liberty wherewith Christ hath made us free, and be not entangled again with the yoke of bondage.

quotes.text: If the Son therefore shall make you free, ye shall be free indeed.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: If the Son therefore shall make you free, ye shall be free indeed.

quotes.text: Now the Lord is that Spirit: and where the Spirit of the Lord is, there is liberty.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Now the Lord is that Spirit: and where the Spirit of the Lord is, there is liberty.

quotes.text: Howbeit this kind goeth not out but by prayer and fasting.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Howbeit this kind goeth not out but by prayer and fasting.

quotes.text: And he said unto them, This kind can come forth by nothing, but by prayer and fasting.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: And he said unto them, This kind can come forth by nothing, but by prayer and fasting.

quotes.text: And when he was at the place, he said unto them, Pray that ye enter not into temptation.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: And when he was at the place, he said unto them, Pray that ye enter not into temptation.

quotes.text: Watch and pray, that ye enter not into temptation: the spirit indeed is willing, but the flesh is weak.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Watch and pray, that ye enter not into temptation: the spirit indeed is willing, but the flesh is weak.

quotes.text: Pray without ceasing.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Pray without ceasing.

quotes.text: Continue in prayer, and watch in the same with thanksgiving.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Continue in prayer, and watch in the same with thanksgiving.

quotes.text: And he spake a parable unto them to this end, that men ought always to pray, and not to faint.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: And he spake a parable unto them to this end, that men ought always to pray, and not to faint.

quotes.text: Rejoicing in hope; patient in tribulation; continuing instant in prayer.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Rejoicing in hope; patient in tribulation; continuing instant in prayer.

quotes.text: Be careful for nothing; but in every thing by prayer and supplication with thanksgiving let your requests be made known unto God.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Be careful for nothing; but in every thing by prayer and supplication with thanksgiving let your requests be made known unto God.

quotes.text: But the natural man receiveth not the things of the Spirit of God: for they are foolishness unto him: neither can he know them, because they are spiritually discerned.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: But the natural man receiveth not the things of the Spirit of God: for they are foolishness unto him: neither can he know them, because they are spiritually discerned.

quotes.text: But strong meat belongeth to them that are of full age, even those who by reason of use have their senses exercised to discern both good and evil.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: But strong meat belongeth to them that are of full age, even those who by reason of use have their senses exercised to discern both good and evil.

quotes.text: Beloved, believe not every spirit, but try the spirits whether they are of God: because many false prophets are gone out into the world.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Beloved, believe not every spirit, but try the spirits whether they are of God: because many false prophets are gone out into the world.

quotes.text: Beware of false prophets, which come to you in sheep's clothing, but inwardly they are ravening wolves.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Beware of false prophets, which come to you in sheep's clothing, but inwardly they are ravening wolves.

quotes.text: And no marvel; for Satan himself is transformed into an angel of light.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: And no marvel; for Satan himself is transformed into an angel of light.

quotes.text: Now the Spirit speaketh expressly, that in the latter times some shall depart from the faith, giving heed to seducing spirits, and doctrines of devils.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Now the Spirit speaketh expressly, that in the latter times some shall depart from the faith, giving heed to seducing spirits, and doctrines of devils.

quotes.text: This know also, that in the last days perilous times shall come.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: This know also, that in the last days perilous times shall come.

quotes.text: For men shall be lovers of their own selves, covetous, boasters, proud, blasphemers, disobedient to parents, unthankful, unholy.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: For men shall be lovers of their own selves, covetous, boasters, proud, blasphemers, disobedient to parents, unthankful, unholy.

quotes.text: Without natural affection, trucebreakers, false accusers, incontinent, fierce, despisers of those that are good.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Without natural affection, trucebreakers, false accusers, incontinent, fierce, despisers of those that are good.

quotes.text: Traitors, heady, highminded, lovers of pleasures more than lovers of God.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Traitors, heady, highminded, lovers of pleasures more than lovers of God.

quotes.text: And ye shall know the truth, and the truth shall make you free.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: And ye shall know the truth, and the truth shall make you free.

quotes.text: For, brethren, ye have been called unto liberty; only use not liberty for an occasion to the flesh, but by love serve one another.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: For, brethren, ye have been called unto liberty; only use not liberty for an occasion to the flesh, but by love serve one another.

quotes.text: Being then made free from sin, ye became the servants of righteousness.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Being then made free from sin, ye became the servants of righteousness.

quotes.text: But now being made free from sin, and become servants to God, ye have your fruit unto holiness, and the end everlasting life.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: But now being made free from sin, and become servants to God, ye have your fruit unto holiness, and the end everlasting life.

quotes.text: For he that is called in the Lord, being a servant, is the Lord's freeman: likewise also he that is called, being free, is Christ's servant.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: For he that is called in the Lord, being a servant, is the Lord's freeman: likewise also he that is called, being free, is Christ's servant.

quotes.text: And that because of false brethren unawares brought in, who came in privily to spy out our liberty which we have in Christ Jesus, that they might bring us into bondage.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: And that because of false brethren unawares brought in, who came in privily to spy out our liberty which we have in Christ Jesus, that they might bring us into bondage.

quotes.text: As free, and not using your liberty for a cloke of maliciousness, but as the servants of God.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: As free, and not using your liberty for a cloke of maliciousness, but as the servants of God.

quotes.text: In all labour there is profit: but the talk of the lips tendeth only to penury.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: In all labour there is profit: but the talk of the lips tendeth only to penury.

quotes.text: He that tilleth his land shall be satisfied with bread: but he that followeth vain persons is void of understanding.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: He that tilleth his land shall be satisfied with bread: but he that followeth vain persons is void of understanding.

quotes.text: The soul of the sluggard desireth, and hath nothing: but the soul of the diligent shall be made fat.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: The soul of the sluggard desireth, and hath nothing: but the soul of the diligent shall be made fat.

quotes.text: The thoughts of the diligent tend only to plenteousness; but of every one that is hasty only to want.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: The thoughts of the diligent tend only to plenteousness; but of every one that is hasty only to want.

quotes.text: Seest thou a man diligent in his business? he shall stand before kings; he shall not stand before mean men.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Seest thou a man diligent in his business? he shall stand before kings; he shall not stand before mean men.

quotes.text: He becometh poor that dealeth with a slack hand: but the hand of the diligent maketh rich.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: He becometh poor that dealeth with a slack hand: but the hand of the diligent maketh rich.

quotes.text: He that gathereth in summer is a wise son: but he that sleepeth in harvest is a son that causeth shame.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: He that gathereth in summer is a wise son: but he that sleepeth in harvest is a son that causeth shame.

quotes.text: Go to the ant, thou sluggard; consider her ways, and be wise.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Go to the ant, thou sluggard; consider her ways, and be wise.

quotes.text: Which having no guide, overseer, or ruler.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Which having no guide, overseer, or ruler.

quotes.text: Provideth her meat in the summer, and gathereth her food in the harvest.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Provideth her meat in the summer, and gathereth her food in the harvest.

quotes.text: How long wilt thou sleep, O sluggard? when wilt thou arise out of thy sleep?
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: How long wilt thou sleep, O sluggard? when wilt thou arise out of thy sleep?

quotes.text: Yet a little sleep, a little slumber, a little folding of the hands to sleep.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Yet a little sleep, a little slumber, a little folding of the hands to sleep.

quotes.text: So shall thy poverty come as one that travelleth, and thy want as an armed man.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: So shall thy poverty come as one that travelleth, and thy want as an armed man.

quotes.text: And whatsoever ye do, do it heartily, as to the Lord, and not unto men.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: And whatsoever ye do, do it heartily, as to the Lord, and not unto men.

quotes.text: Knowing that of the Lord ye shall receive the reward of the inheritance: for ye serve the Lord Christ.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Knowing that of the Lord ye shall receive the reward of the inheritance: for ye serve the Lord Christ.

quotes.text: Whether therefore ye eat, or drink, or whatsoever ye do, do all to the glory of God.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Whether therefore ye eat, or drink, or whatsoever ye do, do all to the glory of God.

quotes.text: With good will doing service, as to the Lord, and not to men.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: With good will doing service, as to the Lord, and not to men.

quotes.text: As every man hath received the gift, even so minister the same one to another, as good stewards of the manifold grace of God.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: As every man hath received the gift, even so minister the same one to another, as good stewards of the manifold grace of God.

quotes.text: Not slothful in business; fervent in spirit; serving the Lord.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Not slothful in business; fervent in spirit; serving the Lord.

quotes.text: And let us not be weary in well doing: for in due season we shall reap, if we faint not.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: And let us not be weary in well doing: for in due season we shall reap, if we faint not.

quotes.text: For even when we were with you, this we commanded you, that if any would not work, neither should he eat.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: For even when we were with you, this we commanded you, that if any would not work, neither should he eat.

quotes.text: But if any provide not for his own, and specially for those of his own house, he hath denied the faith, and is worse than an infidel.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: But if any provide not for his own, and specially for those of his own house, he hath denied the faith, and is worse than an infidel.

quotes.text: In all things showing thyself a pattern of good works: in doctrine showing uncorruptness, gravity, sincerity.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: In all things showing thyself a pattern of good works: in doctrine showing uncorruptness, gravity, sincerity.

quotes.text: He that is faithful in that which is least is faithful also in much: and he that is unjust in the least is unjust also in much.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: He that is faithful in that which is least is faithful also in much: and he that is unjust in the least is unjust also in much.

quotes.text: If therefore ye have not been faithful in the unrighteous mammon, who will commit to your trust the true riches?
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: If therefore ye have not been faithful in the unrighteous mammon, who will commit to your trust the true riches?

quotes.text: And if ye have not been faithful in that which is another man's, who shall give you that which is your own?
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: And if ye have not been faithful in that which is another man's, who shall give you that which is your own?

quotes.text: His lord said unto him, Well done, thou good and faithful servant: thou hast been faithful over a few things, I will make thee ruler over many things: enter thou into the joy of thy lord.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: His lord said unto him, Well done, thou good and faithful servant: thou hast been faithful over a few things, I will make thee ruler over many things: enter thou into the joy of thy lord.

quotes.text: His lord said unto him, Well done, good and faithful servant; thou hast been faithful over a few things, I will make thee ruler over many things: enter thou into the joy of thy lord.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: His lord said unto him, Well done, good and faithful servant; thou hast been faithful over a few things, I will make thee ruler over many things: enter thou into the joy of thy lord.

quotes.text: Moreover it is required in stewards, that a man be found faithful.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Moreover it is required in stewards, that a man be found faithful.

quotes.text: Be thou diligent to know the state of thy flocks, and look well to thy herds.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Be thou diligent to know the state of thy flocks, and look well to thy herds.

quotes.text: For riches are not for ever: and doth the crown endure to every generation?
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: For riches are not for ever: and doth the crown endure to every generation?

quotes.text: Whatsoever thy hand findeth to do, do it with thy might; for there is no work, nor device, nor knowledge, nor wisdom, in the grave, whither thou goest.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Whatsoever thy hand findeth to do, do it with thy might; for there is no work, nor device, nor knowledge, nor wisdom, in the grave, whither thou goest.

quotes.text: Commit thy works unto the Lord, and thy thoughts shall be established.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Commit thy works unto the Lord, and thy thoughts shall be established.

quotes.text: A false balance is abomination to the Lord: but a just weight is his delight.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: A false balance is abomination to the Lord: but a just weight is his delight.

quotes.text: A just weight and balance are the Lord's: all the weights of the bag are his work.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: A just weight and balance are the Lord's: all the weights of the bag are his work.

quotes.text: Divers weights, and divers measures, both of them are alike abomination to the Lord.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Divers weights, and divers measures, both of them are alike abomination to the Lord.

quotes.text: Divers weights are an abomination unto the Lord; and a false balance is not good.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Divers weights are an abomination unto the Lord; and a false balance is not good.

quotes.text: Ye shall do no unrighteousness in judgment, in meteyard, in weight, or in measure.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Ye shall do no unrighteousness in judgment, in meteyard, in weight, or in measure.

quotes.text: Just balances, just weights, a just ephah, and a just hin, shall ye have: I am the Lord your God, which brought you out of the land of Egypt.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Just balances, just weights, a just ephah, and a just hin, shall ye have: I am the Lord your God, which brought you out of the land of Egypt.

quotes.text: Thou shalt not have in thy bag divers weights, a great and a small.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Thou shalt not have in thy bag divers weights, a great and a small.

quotes.text: Thou shalt not have in thine house divers measures, a great and a small.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Thou shalt not have in thine house divers measures, a great and a small.

quotes.text: But thou shalt have a perfect and just weight, a perfect and just measure: that thy days may be lengthened in the land which the Lord thy God giveth thee.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: But thou shalt have a perfect and just weight, a perfect and just measure: that thy days may be lengthened in the land which the Lord thy God giveth thee.

quotes.text: Shall I count them pure with the wicked balances, and with the bag of deceitful weights?
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Shall I count them pure with the wicked balances, and with the bag of deceitful weights?

quotes.text: When the righteous are in authority, the people rejoice: but when the wicked beareth rule, the people mourn.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: When the righteous are in authority, the people rejoice: but when the wicked beareth rule, the people mourn.

quotes.text: It is an abomination to kings to commit wickedness: for the throne is established by righteousness.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: It is an abomination to kings to commit wickedness: for the throne is established by righteousness.

quotes.text: Mercy and truth preserve the king: and his throne is upholden by mercy.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Mercy and truth preserve the king: and his throne is upholden by mercy.

quotes.text: Take away the wicked from before the king, and his throne shall be established in righteousness.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Take away the wicked from before the king, and his throne shall be established in righteousness.

quotes.text: The king by judgment establisheth the land: but he that receiveth gifts overthroweth it.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: The king by judgment establisheth the land: but he that receiveth gifts overthroweth it.

quotes.text: The king that faithfully judgeth the poor, his throne shall be established for ever.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: The king that faithfully judgeth the poor, his throne shall be established for ever.

quotes.text: This is a true saying, If a man desire the office of a bishop, he desireth a good work.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: This is a true saying, If a man desire the office of a bishop, he desireth a good work.

quotes.text: A bishop then must be blameless, the husband of one wife, vigilant, sober, of good behaviour, given to hospitality, apt to teach.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: A bishop then must be blameless, the husband of one wife, vigilant, sober, of good behaviour, given to hospitality, apt to teach.

quotes.text: Not given to wine, no striker, not greedy of filthy lucre; but patient, not a brawler, not covetous.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Not given to wine, no striker, not greedy of filthy lucre; but patient, not a brawler, not covetous.

quotes.text: One that ruleth well his own house, having his children in subjection with all gravity.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: One that ruleth well his own house, having his children in subjection with all gravity.

quotes.text: Without counsel purposes are disappointed: but in the multitude of counsellors they are established.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Without counsel purposes are disappointed: but in the multitude of counsellors they are established.

quotes.text: For by wise counsel thou shalt make thy war: and in multitude of counsellors there is safety.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: For by wise counsel thou shalt make thy war: and in multitude of counsellors there is safety.

quotes.text: Where no counsel is, the people fall: but in the multitude of counsellors there is safety.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Where no counsel is, the people fall: but in the multitude of counsellors there is safety.

quotes.text: Every purpose is established by counsel: and with good advice make war.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Every purpose is established by counsel: and with good advice make war.

quotes.text: Iron sharpeneth iron; so a man sharpeneth the countenance of his friend.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Iron sharpeneth iron; so a man sharpeneth the countenance of his friend.

quotes.text: He that walketh with wise men shall be wise: but a companion of fools shall be destroyed.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: He that walketh with wise men shall be wise: but a companion of fools shall be destroyed.

quotes.text: A wise man will hear, and will increase learning; and a man of understanding shall attain unto wise counsels.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: A wise man will hear, and will increase learning; and a man of understanding shall attain unto wise counsels.

quotes.text: Give instruction to a wise man, and he will be yet wiser: teach a just man, and he will increase in learning.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Give instruction to a wise man, and he will be yet wiser: teach a just man, and he will increase in learning.

quotes.text: Hear counsel, and receive instruction, that thou mayest be wise in thy latter end.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Hear counsel, and receive instruction, that thou mayest be wise in thy latter end.

quotes.text: The way of a fool is right in his own eyes: but he that hearkeneth unto counsel is wise.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: The way of a fool is right in his own eyes: but he that hearkeneth unto counsel is wise.

quotes.text: What? know ye not that your body is the temple of the Holy Ghost which is in you, which ye have of God, and ye are not your own?
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: What? know ye not that your body is the temple of the Holy Ghost which is in you, which ye have of God, and ye are not your own?

quotes.text: For ye are bought with a price: therefore glorify God in your body, and in your spirit, which are God's.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: For ye are bought with a price: therefore glorify God in your body, and in your spirit, which are God's.

quotes.text: Know ye not that ye are the temple of God, and that the Spirit of God dwelleth in you?
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Know ye not that ye are the temple of God, and that the Spirit of God dwelleth in you?

quotes.text: If any man defile the temple of God, him shall God destroy; for the temple of God is holy, which temple ye are.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: If any man defile the temple of God, him shall God destroy; for the temple of God is holy, which temple ye are.

quotes.text: In whom all the building fitly framed together groweth unto an holy temple in the Lord.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: In whom all the building fitly framed together groweth unto an holy temple in the Lord.

quotes.text: In whom ye also are builded together for an habitation of God through the Spirit.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: In whom ye also are builded together for an habitation of God through the Spirit.

quotes.text: Ye also, as lively stones, are built up a spiritual house, an holy priesthood, to offer up spiritual sacrifices, acceptable to God by Jesus Christ.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Ye also, as lively stones, are built up a spiritual house, an holy priesthood, to offer up spiritual sacrifices, acceptable to God by Jesus Christ.

quotes.text: But ye are a chosen generation, a royal priesthood, an holy nation, a peculiar people; that ye should show forth the praises of him who hath called you out of darkness into his marvellous light.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: But ye are a chosen generation, a royal priesthood, an holy nation, a peculiar people; that ye should show forth the praises of him who hath called you out of darkness into his marvellous light.

quotes.text: Beloved, I wish above all things that thou mayest prosper and be in health, even as thy soul prospereth.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Beloved, I wish above all things that thou mayest prosper and be in health, even as thy soul prospereth.

quotes.text: A merry heart doeth good like a medicine: but a broken spirit drieth the bones.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: A merry heart doeth good like a medicine: but a broken spirit drieth the bones.

quotes.text: A sound heart is the life of the flesh: but envy the rottenness of the bones.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: A sound heart is the life of the flesh: but envy the rottenness of the bones.

quotes.text: The light of the eyes rejoiceth the heart: and a good report maketh the bones fat.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: The light of the eyes rejoiceth the heart: and a good report maketh the bones fat.

quotes.text: Pleasant words are as an honeycomb, sweet to the soul, and health to the bones.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Pleasant words are as an honeycomb, sweet to the soul, and health to the bones.

quotes.text: Heaviness in the heart of man maketh it stoop: but a good word maketh it glad.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Heaviness in the heart of man maketh it stoop: but a good word maketh it glad.

quotes.text: A merry heart maketh a cheerful countenance: but by sorrow of the heart the spirit is broken.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: A merry heart maketh a cheerful countenance: but by sorrow of the heart the spirit is broken.

quotes.text: All the days of the afflicted are evil: but he that is of a merry heart hath a continual feast.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: All the days of the afflicted are evil: but he that is of a merry heart hath a continual feast.

quotes.text: The spirit of a man will sustain his infirmity; but a wounded spirit who can bear?
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: The spirit of a man will sustain his infirmity; but a wounded spirit who can bear?

quotes.text: As cold waters to a thirsty soul, so is good news from a far country.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: As cold waters to a thirsty soul, so is good news from a far country.

quotes.text: But I keep under my body, and bring it into subjection: lest that by any means, when I have preached to others, I myself should be a castaway.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: But I keep under my body, and bring it into subjection: lest that by any means, when I have preached to others, I myself should be a castaway.

quotes.text: But the fruit of the Spirit is love, joy, peace, longsuffering, gentleness, goodness, faith.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: But the fruit of the Spirit is love, joy, peace, longsuffering, gentleness, goodness, faith.

quotes.text: Meekness, temperance: against such there is no law.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Meekness, temperance: against such there is no law.

quotes.text: Teaching us that, denying ungodliness and worldly lusts, we should live soberly, righteously, and godly, in this present world.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Teaching us that, denying ungodliness and worldly lusts, we should live soberly, righteously, and godly, in this present world.

quotes.text: But the end of all things is at hand: be ye therefore sober, and watch unto prayer.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: But the end of all things is at hand: be ye therefore sober, and watch unto prayer.

quotes.text: Therefore let us not sleep, as do others; but let us watch and be sober.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Therefore let us not sleep, as do others; but let us watch and be sober.

quotes.text: But let us, who are of the day, be sober, putting on the breastplate of faith and love; and for an helmet, the hope of salvation.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: But let us, who are of the day, be sober, putting on the breastplate of faith and love; and for an helmet, the hope of salvation.

quotes.text: Even so must their wives be grave, not slanderers, sober, faithful in all things.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Even so must their wives be grave, not slanderers, sober, faithful in all things.

quotes.text: But he answered and said, It is written, Man shall not live by bread alone, but by every word that proceedeth out of the mouth of God.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: But he answered and said, It is written, Man shall not live by bread alone, but by every word that proceedeth out of the mouth of God.

quotes.text: And Jesus said unto them, I am the bread of life: he that cometh to me shall never hunger; and he that believeth on me shall never thirst.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: And Jesus said unto them, I am the bread of life: he that cometh to me shall never hunger; and he that believeth on me shall never thirst.

quotes.text: I am the living bread which came down from heaven: if any man eat of this bread, he shall live for ever: and the bread that I will give is my flesh, which I will give for the life of the world.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: I am the living bread which came down from heaven: if any man eat of this bread, he shall live for ever: and the bread that I will give is my flesh, which I will give for the life of the world.

quotes.text: But whosoever drinketh of the water that I shall give him shall never thirst; but the water that I shall give him shall be in him a well of water springing up into everlasting life.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: But whosoever drinketh of the water that I shall give him shall never thirst; but the water that I shall give him shall be in him a well of water springing up into everlasting life.

quotes.text: In the last day, that great day of the feast, Jesus stood and cried, saying, If any man thirst, let him come unto me, and drink.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: In the last day, that great day of the feast, Jesus stood and cried, saying, If any man thirst, let him come unto me, and drink.

quotes.text: He that believeth on me, as the scripture hath said, out of his belly shall flow rivers of living water.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: He that believeth on me, as the scripture hath said, out of his belly shall flow rivers of living water.

quotes.text: O taste and see that the Lord is good: blessed is the man that trusteth in him.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: O taste and see that the Lord is good: blessed is the man that trusteth in him.

quotes.text: How sweet are thy words unto my taste! yea, sweeter than honey to my mouth!
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: How sweet are thy words unto my taste! yea, sweeter than honey to my mouth!

quotes.text: My son, eat thou honey, because it is good; and the honeycomb, which is sweet to thy taste.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: My son, eat thou honey, because it is good; and the honeycomb, which is sweet to thy taste.

quotes.text: Hast thou found honey? eat so much as is sufficient for thee, lest thou be filled therewith, and vomit it.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Hast thou found honey? eat so much as is sufficient for thee, lest thou be filled therewith, and vomit it.

quotes.text: Remember the sabbath day, to keep it holy.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Remember the sabbath day, to keep it holy.

quotes.text: Six days shalt thou labour, and do all thy work.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Six days shalt thou labour, and do all thy work.

quotes.text: For in six days the Lord made heaven and earth, the sea, and all that in them is, and rested the seventh day: wherefore the Lord blessed the sabbath day, and hallowed it.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: For in six days the Lord made heaven and earth, the sea, and all that in them is, and rested the seventh day: wherefore the Lord blessed the sabbath day, and hallowed it.

quotes.text: And he said unto them, The sabbath was made for man, and not man for the sabbath.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: And he said unto them, The sabbath was made for man, and not man for the sabbath.

quotes.text: There remaineth therefore a rest to the people of God.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: There remaineth therefore a rest to the people of God.

quotes.text: For he that is entered into his rest, he also hath ceased from his own works, as God did from his.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: For he that is entered into his rest, he also hath ceased from his own works, as God did from his.

quotes.text: Come unto me, all ye that labour and are heavy laden, and I will give you rest.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Come unto me, all ye that labour and are heavy laden, and I will give you rest.

quotes.text: Take my yoke upon you, and learn of me; for I am meek and lowly in heart: and ye shall find rest unto your souls.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Take my yoke upon you, and learn of me; for I am meek and lowly in heart: and ye shall find rest unto your souls.

quotes.text: He maketh me to lie down in green pastures: he leadeth me beside the still waters.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: He maketh me to lie down in green pastures: he leadeth me beside the still waters.

quotes.text: He giveth power to the faint; and to them that have no might he increaseth strength.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: He giveth power to the faint; and to them that have no might he increaseth strength.

quotes.text: Even the youths shall faint and be weary, and the young men shall utterly fall.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: Even the youths shall faint and be weary, and the young men shall utterly fall.

quotes.text: But they that wait upon the Lord shall renew their strength; they shall mount up with wings as eagles; they shall run, and not be weary; and they shall walk, and not faint.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: But they that wait upon the Lord shall renew their strength; they shall mount up with wings as eagles; they shall run, and not be weary; and they shall walk, and not faint.

quotes.text: I can do all things through Christ which strengtheneth me.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: I can do all things through Christ which strengtheneth me.

quotes.text: It is God that girdeth me with strength, and maketh my way perfect.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: It is God that girdeth me with strength, and maketh my way perfect.

quotes.text: The Lord is my strength and my shield; my heart trusted in him, and I am helped: therefore my heart greatly rejoiceth; and with my song will I praise him.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: The Lord is my strength and my shield; my heart trusted in him, and I am helped: therefore my heart greatly rejoiceth; and with my song will I praise him.

quotes.text: God is our refuge and strength, a very present help in trouble.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: God is our refuge and strength, a very present help in trouble.

quotes.text: My flesh and my heart faileth: but God is the strength of my heart, and my portion for ever.
quotes.author: Holy Bible (KJV)

scripture_kjv.text: My flesh and my heart faileth: but God is the strength of my heart, and my portion for ever.
